h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: When the Stone Monkey's health bar has been depleted, he'll face off still against The Destined One. A cutscene will see the Destined One hold his own against the giant monkey, sending our duplicates to put an end to the creature.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
When the Stone Monkey's health bar has been depleted, he'll face off still against The Destined One. A cutscene will see the Destined One hold his own against the giant monkey, sending our duplicates to put an end to the creature.
